alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 12:20PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM AKDT SUNDAY FOR THE GULKANA RIVER FROM SOURDOUGH TO GULKANA... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Including the following area, the Gulkana River from Sourdough through Gulkana. * WHEN...Until 715 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. High water may impact isolated locations along the Richardson Highway. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1207 PM AKDT, river gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from rapid snowmelt is causing minor flooding. This is causing minor flooding from overflow of poor drainage areas. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas along the Gulkana River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
